name: High Noon (itch) (Brain Station 23)
description:
High Noon

High Noon is a fast paced action duel game. Do you dare to face against the fastest guns around the globe? Take your chance and find out! 

Connect to the same room and challenge your friend to decide who's the fastest gun once and for all!

Controls

A~D - Strafe
Q~E - Dodge
Space - Duck
Mouse - Aim
RMB - Draw Gun
LMB - Shoot
